title: Pr
content:
Hey Everyone..   
   
Heres the second font im looking for. ![Second font.. looks like a shampoo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121104209im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49228.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Pearl Moon Boutique - Futura {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121104209/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6730 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Stonebriar - Binner Gothic {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121104209/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6729 "Go to next forum topic")
author: arcanegel

comments.content: I don't know the font, but in my opinion TF Arrow has the same flavor, better executed. Of course, it has the closed P and R, which would be a problem if you're trying to match this exactly.
